name: Mountain Dell Open
description: Join the annual Mountain Dell Open! All skill levels welcome. Prizes for top finishers.

name: Salt Lake City Charity Scramble
description: A fun 4-person scramble supporting local charities. Registration required.

name: Autumn Classic Invitational
description: Competitive invitational tournament. Limited spots, advanced registration recommended.

name: Winter League Kickoff
description: Start of the winter league! Casual play, weekly scoring, open to all skill levels.

name: Holiday Golf Bash
description: Celebrate the season with a festive round of golf, prizes, and refreshments.
